response: Photosynthesis is how plants make their own food using sunlight, water, and air. They turn sunlight into energy.
Photosynthesis means plants use sunlight and water to create food. It’s like their way of cooking energy from light.
Reading opens your mind and helps you imagine new worlds. Try picking a book you love and set a small goal to finish it!
Books are fun, but they can also make you smarter! Reading every day helps you learn about new ideas and people.
